item.description:
V A L L E Y 9/11 T R U T H

Presents the new 9/11 DVD from AE911Truth.org

9/11: Blueprint for Truth: The Architecture of Destruction

Running time: 2 hours

The 2-hour newly revised film is of a multimedia presentation by Richard Gage, AIA, explaining the evidence of controlled demolition using explosives at all 3 WTC high-rise "collapses" on September 11, 2001.

Richard Gage AIA has been a practicing Architect for 20 years and became interested in the 9/11 WTC collapses after hearing the startling conclusions of a reluctant 9/11 researcher, David Ray Griffin, on radio in 2006, which launched his own unyielding quest for 9/11 Truth. There has been a recent surge of highly respected individuals and scientists questioning the 'official' government version. World-renowned scientist, Lynn Margulis, Ph.D, distinguished Professor in Geosciences, University of Massachusetts, Amherst, severely criticized the official account of 9/11 and called for a new investigation. (PatriotsQuestion911.com)

A Zogby International poll found a majority of Americans still await a Congressional investigation of President Bush' and Vice President Cheney's actions before, during and after the 9/11 attacks. The 911truth.org sponsored poll also found that over two-thirds of Americans say the 9/11 Commission should have investigated the still unexplained collapse of the 47-story World Trade Center Building 7 at 5:20 pm on September 11, 2001.

“9/11: Blueprint for Truth: The Architecture of Destruction” exposes the 'official' story and is highly recommended to all who seek facts and careful analysis of what really happened.

# # #

Valley 9/11 Truth will have its meeting
beginning at 6:00 pm, the film will begin at 7:00 PM
with discussions planned following film.

Please help us invite all, but especially registered architects and engineers to view this film!
Almost 600 of their colleagues have signed the petition for a new investigation at
ae911truth.org
